languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, рада, что вы целы! Когда вы пропали, я думала, что все, каюк, потеряла вас как Леди Теодору, опять без Лорд-капитана осталась. Всеми силами пыталась не быть обузой и хоть что-то полезное делать, день и ночь шепотки слушала, пытаясь хоть какую-то крупицу информации о вас выловить".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, рада, что вы целы! Когда вы пропали, я думала, что все, каюк, потеряла вас как леди Теодору, опять без Лорд-капитана осталась. Но нет, вы у нас живчик тот еще!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, рада, что вы целы! Когда вы пропали, я думала, что все, каюк, потеряла вас как Леди Теодору, опять без Лорд-капитана осталась. Всеми силами пыталась не быть обузой и хоть что-то полезное делать, день и ночь шепотки слушала, пытаясь хоть какую-то крупицу информации о вас выловить".

I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，看到你安然无恙，我真的很开心！当你消失不见的时候，我当时在想，完蛋了，西奥多拉夫人离开了我，你也离开了我，我又要失去我的舰长了。我尽可能地做些有用的小事，想要派上点用场。我没日没夜地聆听那些窃窃私语，想要寻找关于你的蛛丝马迹。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，看到你安然无恙，我真的很开心！当你消失不见的时候，我当时在想，完蛋了，西奥多拉夫人离开了我，你也离开了我，我又要失去我的舰长了。我尽可能地做些有用的小事，想要派上点用场。我没日没夜地聆听那些窃窃私语，想要寻找关于你的蛛丝马迹。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, me alegro mucho de verl{mf|e|a} san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}! Cuando desapareció, pensé que era el fin, que l{mf|e|a} había perdido como a lady Theodora. Otra vez sin Lord Capitán. Hice todo lo que pude para resultar útil de cualquier manera. Me pasé día y noche escuchando a los susurros, tratando de descubrir cualquier cosa sobre usted».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, me alegro mucho de verl{mf|e|a} san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}! Cuando desapareció, pensé que era el fin, que l{mf|e|a} había perdido como a lady Theodora. Otra vez sin Lord Capitán. Hice todo lo que pude para resultar útil de cualquier manera. Me pasé día y noche escuchando a los susurros, tratando de descubrir cualquier cosa sobre usted».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wie freut es mich, dass Ihr wohlauf seid! Als Ihr verschwunden seid, dachte ich, das war's. Dass ich Euch verloren hätte, genau wie Lady Theodora. Dass ich wieder ohne Lord Captain dasitze. Ich habe getan, was ich konnte, um mich irgendwie nützlich zu machen. Ich habe Tag und Nacht dem Geflüster gelauscht, um zu versuchen, irgendetwas über Euch herauszufischen, egal was."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wie freut es mich, dass Ihr wohlauf seid! Als Ihr verschwunden seid, dachte ich, das war's. Dass ich Euch verloren hätte, genau wie Lady Theodora. Dass ich wieder ohne Lord Captain dasitze. Ich habe getan, was ich konnte, um mich irgendwie nützlich zu machen. Ich habe Tag und Nacht dem Geflüster gelauscht, um zu versuchen, irgendetwas über Euch herauszufischen, egal was."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、元気でいてくれて本当に良かったわ！陛下が姿を消した時は、シオドーラ様の時のように失ってしまったかと思ったの。またロード・キャプテンがいなくなってしまったって。だから少しでも役に立てればと思って、昼も夜も囁き声に耳を傾けて、何でもいいから陛下のことを聞き出そうとしていたのよ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、元気でいてくれて本当に良かったわ！陛下が姿を消した時は、シオドーラ様の時のように失ってしまったかと思ったの。またロード・キャプテンがいなくなってしまったって。だから少しでも役に立てればと思って、昼も夜も囁き声に耳を傾けて、何でもいいから陛下のことを聞き出そうとしていたのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis heureuse de constater que vous vous portez comme un charme, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Quand vous avez disparu, j'ai craint de vous avoir {mf|perdu|perdue}, tout comme j'ai perdu dame Théodora pour me retrouver à nouveau sans {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai fait mon possible pour me rendre utile, j'ai écouté les murmures jour et nuit dans l'espoir d'apprendre quoi que ce soit à votre sujet. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis heureuse de constater que vous vous portez comme un charme, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Quand vous avez disparu, j'ai craint de vous avoir {mf|perdu|perdue}, tout comme j'ai perdu dame Théodora pour me retrouver à nouveau sans {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'ai fait mon possible pour me rendre utile, j'ai écouté les murmures jour et nuit dans l'espoir d'apprendre quoi que ce soit à votre sujet. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "İyi olmana çok sevindim Lord Kaptan! Ortadan kaybolduğunda seni de Leydi Theodora'yı kaybettiğim gibi kaybettim sandım. Yine Lord Kaptan'sız kaldığımı düşündüm. Az da olsa bir işe yaramak için elimden geleni yaptım. Gece gündüz demeden fısıltıları dinledim, seninle ilgili bir şeyler yakalamaya çalıştım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm real glad to see you're fine and well! When you disappeared, I thought, that's it, I'd lost you just like I did Lady Theodora. Left without a Lord Captain again. I did everything I could to make myself useful in some small way, I listened to the whispers day and night trying to fish out something, anything about you."

traits.locale_text: "İyi olmana çok sevindim Lord Kaptan! Ortadan kaybolduğunda seni de Leydi Theodora'yı kaybettiğim gibi kaybettim sandım. Yine Lord Kaptansız kaldığımı düşündüm. Az da olsa bir işe yaramak için elimden geleni yaptım. Gece gündüz demeden fısıltıları dinledim, seninle ilgili bir şeyler yakalamaya çalıştım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
